data.name: Battle Heroine Crisis - Ganessa's Challenge
data.detailed_description:
Battle Heroine crisis
Ganessa's challenge!

Beautiful Heroine Battle + New Meeting of Card Deck Building!


Story
A beautiful heroine fighting an unknown enemy threatening humanity [Pandora].
BHC's new DLC has emerged with a unique meeting and battle with Pandora!
Let's challenge our limits with the new Pandora Ganessa!


The flow of the game.
- Battle Heroine Crisis is required to play this DLC.
- You can challenge a series of battles with your new character Ganessa.
- You have to use the card deck made by BHC for the game.
- The player must clear a section consisting of 10 turns.
- At the end of each section is the section boss. Enjoy the full animation battle.
- In each section, new enemies and strategies test you.
You may have to change the character of the card deck every moment.
Clear a number of difficult situations.
- Records of this particular challenge are saved and can be compared to other players through screenshots.
- How far can you continue the challenge?
Challenge your limits with your own strategy!
